title: My main account was hacked and i forgot the email address associated with that account
body:
And I've tried to submit my request but it didn't work because when i tried to submit my request, this site always say that information is not enough even though i filled all of them out. it makes me feel crazy wow...

So, what can i do in this situation...my account is -snip- and...nick name is -snip-

replies.body: I've snipped out your account name for your privacy and account security.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can help you out individually.  We'll help towards recovering your account!

Hello, we can't help you about account security, no choice but to submit a request to the Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Try and fill as much as you can. Where does it say it's not enough? (don't provide private information on the boards).
